title: 3 KEYðŸ”‘ differences between BANDEJA and VIBORA

sections.title: Introduction
sections.description: Brief introduction highlighting the importance of knowing the differences between bandeja and vibora for advanced players.

sections.title: Preparation Difference
sections.description: Explanation of the different racket preparations: bandeja uses a high preparation with an open racket face, while vibora has the racket behind the head with a slightly closed face.

sections.title: Spin Difference
sections.description: Demonstration of how bandeja creates backspin with a high-to-low motion, while vibora generates side spin by coming around the ball.

sections.title: Speed Difference
sections.description: Comparison of power levels: bandeja is a defensive shot played at 40-50% power to maintain net position, while vibora is more aggressive at 70-80% power to win points.

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.description: Final demonstration showing both shots in action and their distinct differences.

notes: Concise and informative video comparing two key overhead shots in padel. Clear visual demonstrations of the differences in technique, spin, and power. Excellent instructional content for intermediate players looking to understand when and how to use each shot. High production quality with good slow-motion sequences.
